Description: Beautiful, well lit 3 bedroom apartment steps away from Washington Square in Brookline. 2 full bathrooms. Huge living room Washer-Dryer included in unit. A short walk to both the C and D Green line trains. 2 parking spaces (one of them is in an enclosed garage) included in rent! Private Balcony and shared back patio. November 1 start date and lease ending is negotiable between May 1, 2024 and September 1, 2024 NO BROKER FEE
